channel.title: Atakan Ozgur Yildiz
channel.description: Recent content on Atakan Ozgur Yildiz

item.title: Announcing psycopg2-wrapper
item.description: psycopg2 is a postgresql database adapter for database operations. It is used behind many orm tools. I prefer to use orm tools for big projects and psycopg2 for small projects. When I use psycopg2 in my projects, I realize that I always create a database.py and use it to execute sql commands so I have decided to create a package and publish it. It’ s very basic psycopg2 wrapper and it works fine for basic usage.

item.title: Psycopg2 Wrapper
item.description: Very simple psycopg2 wrapper for executing sql commands with one line code. It manages database connections and cursor easily. It’ s developed for basic usages. It uses client side connection pool and connection size is configurable. It uses client side cursor. It manages creating and closing of cursors and connections. It has easy interface to execute query, only one method. It uses transaction block for crud(insert-update-delete-select) operations. It uses auto commit mode for non crud operations.

item.title: hyde-hyde
item.description: Hyde-hyde is a responsive Hugo theme inspired by @spf13’s Hyde and its variant Nate Finch’s blog. It was heavily restructured with modularised page layouts for easier maintenance and modification. Hyde-hyde offers awesome features such as nice colour tone, code highlighting, Font-Awesome 5’s sidebar icons), a cool portfolio page, more choices for commenting (e.g. GraphComment, Disqus).

item.title: About me
item.description: I’ m Atakan Özgür Yıldız. I work as a backend developer at Trendyol that the biggest e-commerce company in Turkey. I want to share basic post in this blog.
